Class Villager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Unit
      • Villager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aldric, Elvira, Garth

    public abstract class Villager
extends Unit
    Represents the base class for all Villager sub-types in the game world.

      • canRenderDialogue

        public void canRenderDialogue(Player player,
                              int talk,
                              int delta)
        Determines if dialogue can be render based on player proximity, if talk is pressed and if dialogue is already pressed
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to check proximity against
        talk - if the talk key is pressed
        delta - time passed since last frame (milliseconds)

      • update

        public abstract void update(Player player,
                            int[] input,
                            Item[] items,
                            int delta)
        Update the game state for a frame
        Parameters:
        player - the Player object thats is interacting with the Villager
        input - array of keyboard inputs
        items - array of all items loaded into the World
        delta - time passed since last frame (milliseconds)
